Title: Zombies Ate My High-School
Description:
Zombies Ate My High-School is a side-scrolling perspective 3D game where the player is pit against hordes of zombies.  The hero must save his girlfriend from being turned into one of the undead.  The game is written entirely in C# using the XNA framework.

The game features textured quads, particle systems, animated sprites, basic 3D collision detection and response, audio and 3D models.  The game is customizable to a degree with many parameters and settings read in from XML files (levels, animations).
